resources.string: Welcome to Arena Fighting club. \nChoose fighter or create new one.
Set URL on avatar you want to get
Was born on a wild planet. All his life he fought for survival, his body is covered with scars, his soul is thirsty for blood.
A descendant of the royal family, a noble knight fighting for good and justice.
This bounty hunter takes on any dirty work. The only thing he cares about is gold.
This farmer had to take up arms when the world eaters attacked his planet. Since then, he can not find peace.
One of the squad destroyers of worlds. Ruthless killer who eats the bodies of their victims.
I\'m tired of writing information, so let this be nonsense. Let\'s see if someone will read.
